expo.name: Golf AI Coach

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to record and analyze your golf swing.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to save golf swing videos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs permission to save analyzed golf swing videos to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone to record audio with your golf swing videos.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses location to find nearby golf courses and weather information.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Golf AI Coach to access your photos.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow Golf AI Coach to save photos.

expo.description: AI-powered golf swing analysis and coaching app with real-time feedback and personalized training programs.
